segments.text: Helen , you must be excited at going to America to study .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I've been looking forward to it for ages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do your classmates think of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They give me a lot of congratulations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will you study there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , maybe three years . I will study and get the master degree first . Then I will decide whether I will stay there or come back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which university will you go to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Chicago University . My major is Economics .
segments.speaker: S2
